summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Multivitamin Power Recovery Cream is a vitamin-rich daily moisturizer created with an antioxidant-packed complex of vitamins A, C and E designed to help prevent the signs of stressed skin - including the appearance of fine lines, dehydration, and dullness. Stressed skin, solved.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides immediate nourishment to hydrate and de-stress skinFights environmental stressors with powerful multivitaminsBoosts skin resilience to prevent premature signs of skin agingKey IngredientsACE Vitamin Complex: neutralizes free radicals and fortifies skin's barrierFreshwater Microalgae with Astaxanthin: help to firm and lift tired skinResilience-Building Peptide Blend: visibly minimizes the look of fine lines and wrinklesPro-Vitamin B5 and Niacinamide: soothe dehydration-stressed skinResearch Results100% showed more radiant skin94% had more hydrated skin*Independent clinical result after 1 application based on a 4-week study of 31 subjects, 2 applications/dayItem 2633649How To UseAfter cleansing and toning, apply over face and neck with light, upward strokes. Use twice daily, morning and night.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Panthenol, Linoleic Acid, Cetyl Palmitate, Niacinamide, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopheryl Acetate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Hydroxyacetophenone, Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Lactic Acid, Aminopropyl Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Aniba Rosodora (Rosewood) Wood Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Leaf Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Leaf/Nut/Stem Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Spirodela Polyrhiza Extract, Tocopherol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Squalane, Polyglycerin-10, Linolenic Acid, Chrysin, Beta-Carotene, Retinol, Pentylene Glycol, Ceramide NP, C15-19 Alkane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbitan Olivate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sorbitan Oleate, Pantolactone, Polysorbate 20, Laureth-23, Trideceth-6 Phosphate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Linalool, Eugenol, Limonene, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply over face and neck with light, upward strokes. Use twice daily, morning and night.

reviews.headline: Thick and not Greasy
reviews.comments: Love this for my aging skin. It absorbs very quickly and isn't too heavy.

reviews.headline: Like the product but not the packing
reviews.comments: Im 58 with rosacea (developed during menopause). I like the product as it's gentle and doesnt cause me to breakout. Overall pleased with the results. Only complaint I have is the packaging. When it's about 1/3 full, the pump no longer distributes the product. Is a pain to get the remaining product out of the bottle. At this price point, I should be able to get every last drop!

reviews.headline: Love Dermalogica
reviews.comments: My skin responds so well to their products and this one is no exception!

reviews.headline: Incredible and effective!
reviews.comments: Gifted by dermalogica Absolutely incredible and super effective but you must use daily for drastic results. This serum has caused my skin to tighten and even appear more even toned plus reduce crepey looking skin!

reviews.headline: I will for sure buy the Multivitamin Recovery Cream again.
reviews.comments: I have been using the Intensive Moisture Cream for years. The Multivitamin Recovery Cream kept popping up in ads on my phone. I tried it. I'm in love with it. I can feel and see a huge difference.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I love this product because it makes my skin so smooth and fresh when I use it.

reviews.headline: Didn't like it
reviews.comments: I got this cream because of the multivitamin mask I had used and that was really good , this cream was from the same line , it has a wearied yellow tinge to it when you apply and bad smell , plus doesn't do much for the skin , I gave it two stars because otherwise I love dermalogica products except for this one

reviews.headline: Amaaaazing Feel
reviews.comments: Makes my skin so soft and drenched. Loving the moisture feel to my skin.

reviews.headline: Noticeable Skin Improvement with No Irritation
reviews.comments:
I gifted the Dermalogica MultiVitamin Power Recovery Cream to my boyfriend for his birthday, and I've seen a remarkable improvement in his skin! The fine lines on his forehead have noticeably softened, and the dry, red patches on his face have completely disappeared. His skin looks smoother, more hydrated, and revitalized.

What I love most is that the cream doesn't burn or cause any redness—it has a smooth, soft texture that reminds me of the Benefit POREfessional Primer, but with a more moisturizing feel. He loves how it makes his skin feel hydrated without being greasy. Definitely a product I'd recommend for anyone looking to improve their skin's appearance and overall health!

reviews.headline: Amazing Skin Recovery Cream
reviews.comments:
The cream from this series exceeded my expectations! It spreads beautifully on the skin and absorbs quickly without any greasy residue. It provides excellent hydration, leaving my skin feeling soft and deeply nourished.
It works wonders on fine lines - my skin looks smoother and more refined. I have a noticeable crease on my forehead, and after just two weeks of use, the line has become almost invisible.
This cream is a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their skincare routine! I got it gifted by Dermalogica!

reviews.headline: Great multivitamin cream
reviews.comments: Alright straight out the gate, I was gifted by dermalogica… BUT I am a user and firm supporter of the brand and their products. I've tested this for 14 days and have formulated my honest review! So, as for the cream… I am loving it! It feels great in the skin when layering with my other products. I haven't had any reactions, it's replaced my vitamin c serum and given my skin a great boost. Looking forward to seeing a complete use of the product as it's now in my daily AM morning rotation!

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: This cream has completely transformed my face! It has decreased the appearance of fine lines and leaves my skin feeling super glowy and soft. It's perfect for dry mature skin types. Gifted by Dermalogica

reviews.headline: Fighting Back Against Aging
reviews.comments:
As a busy 40-year-old mom,  My skin was showing signs of aging – dryness, fine lines, dullness, and even some sagging.

From the first use, I noticed a significant improvement. My skin felt noticeably more hydrated, and I even saw a subtle reduction in the appearance of fine lines. Over the following weeks, my skin's brightness and firmness gradually increased.

The product has a pleasant, spa-like scent that makes my morning and evening skincare routine feel like a mini-indulgence.

I appreciate Dermalogica's commitment to quality and their focus on delivering effective products. This has become an essential part of my skincare regimen, and I'm highly impressed with the results. I was gifted by Dermalogica.

reviews.headline: Its like a smoothie of vitamins for my skin!
reviews.comments: The first thing I noticed was how smooth and creamy this moisturizer feels. It goes on easily and absorbs fast without feeling greasy, which I really like. It feels like it gives my skin a lot of moisture every time I use it. Over the past few weeks, my skin looks brighter and less dull. I have some redness, especially in the cold, and this cream has helped calm it down. It doesn't cause breakouts, which is great because my skin is sensitive and prone to acne. I really like the mix of vitamins. It feels like I'm giving my skin the nutrients it needs to heal overnight. Although it's a bit expensive, the visible improvements in my skin and its texture make it worth it, I think. My skin feels plumper, and the wrinkles around my eyes and forehead are less noticeable! Gifted by Dermalogica.

reviews.headline: All you really need!
reviews.comments: Small but mighty because it has everything that you need especially in the wintertime. Lately my skin has been dry and cracking from the wind and snow, however this has brought my skin back to life. It's a rich cream and absorbs well into the skin. I'm in my early thirties and it's also helping me with the fine lines especially on my forehead. Complimentary from Dermalogica.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: This product was gifted by Dermalogica for review purposes. Dermalogica has continued to surprise me with their products because they're just consistently good. I love this product because of the feel and texture of it! It's packed with vitamins and it helps with environmental stressors, which is an absolute plus when we're dealing with wildfires and smoky air.

reviews.headline: Great for brighter and smoother skin
reviews.comments: I'm now in my 30s and noticed some fine lines coming through as well as drier skin. This moisturizer seemed promising to target my skin concerns so I wanted to try it out. Immediately after using it for the first time my skin felt a lot firmer, hydrated, and smoother. I applied this at night as the last step in my skincare routine and I noticed results within the first use. After a few weeks of using this I noticed my fine lines were more faint and my skin overall looked healthier and brighter. This product was complimentary from dermalogica, but does not impact my opinions.

reviews.headline: The best recovery cream
reviews.comments: If your skin is dry or damaged by exfoliators - you have to try this cream! It's literally a life savior!! I've been struggling with dry/dull/dehydrated skin for months because I use acids for acne and this is the only cream that helped and didn't cause any extra breakouts. My skin looks so much more healthy and glowy after a few weeks of using it. I'll definitely be repurchasing! This product was gifted to me by dermalogica.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This product was gifted to me by dermalogica. I received this product about two weeks ago to try out. I've been using it everyday for over a week now and I've been loving it. It does not bother my sensitive skin. It leaves my skin looking nice and smooth.

reviews.headline: Dull to radiant
reviews.comments: This stuff brings my skin back to life. I go through periods of dull looking skin every now and then but after a few nights of this, my skins barrier is moisturized and leaves my skin feeling smooth. Gifted by Dermalogica

media.headline: Fighting Back Against Aging
media.caption: A little goes along way on the face and the neck, and super easy to come out.

media.caption: Love the note and the package

media.headline: Fighting Back Against Aging
media.caption: Already seeing my complexion looking brighter.

media.headline: Worth the price
media.caption: After few days of using it

media.headline: A powerful,vitamin-rich cream that revitalizes stressed skin
A powerful,vitamin-rich cream that revitalizes stressed skin
A powerful,vitamin-rich cream that revitalizes stressed skin

faceoff_positive.comments: For the past two weeks, I have been using the Multivitamin Power Recovery Cream gifted by dermatologica, and it has given me very good results. My skin, which lately looked dull, tired, and lackluster, has regained vitality and, most importantly, brightness. The cream has a rich, luxurious texture that absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feel, while providing deep hydration and instant softness, which is a big plus. I love its refreshing, pleasant, and natural scent, thanks to the natural extracts in its formula. I really appreciate the presence of vitamins A, C, and E, which help reduce uneven skin tone, provide brightness, stimulate collagen formation, and protect against environmental pollutants. My skin feels noticeably softer and more hydrated after each application, achieving a more radiant and renewed appearance. I definitely recommend it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Loving the ingredients

faceoff_negative.comments: I got this cream because of the multivitamin mask I had used and that was really good , this cream was from the same line , it has a wearied yellow tinge to it when you apply and bad smell , plus doesn't do much for the skin , I gave it two stars because otherwise I love dermalogica products except for this one
faceoff_negative.headline: Didn't like it
